name: EventFilterer
description: The `EventFilterer` is a fundamental interface in JSMacros that provides sophisticated event filtering capabilities. It allows you to control which events trigger your event listeners based on specific criteria, reducing unnecessary script execution and improving performance.
overview: Event filters are essential when working with frequently triggered events like packet events or block updates. Instead of processing every single event, you can specify conditions that must be met before your script logic executes.

methods.name: canFilter
methods.description: Returns whether this filterer can handle the specified event type. This method is part of the core `EventFilterer` interface.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Tests whether an event passes the filter criteria. This method is part of the core `EventFilterer` interface.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Set the packet type to filter. This method belongs to `FiltererSendPacket` and `FiltererRecvPacket`.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Packet name or `null` for all packets

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Set a single position to filter. This method belongs to `FiltererBlockUpdate`.

methods.name: setArea
methods.signature: setArea(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2) / setArea(pos1, pos2)
methods.description: Set a cubic area to filter. This method belongs to `FiltererBlockUpdate`.

parameters.name: pos1, pos2
parameters.description: Corner positions of the area (alternative signature)

methods.name: setBlockId
methods.description: Set the block ID to filter. This method belongs to `FiltererBlockUpdate`.

methods.name: setUpdateType
methods.description: Set the update type to filter. This method belongs to `FiltererBlockUpdate`.

methods.name: setBlockStates
methods.description: Set multiple block state properties. This method belongs to `FiltererBlockUpdate`.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Map of property names to values

methods.name: setBlockState
methods.description: Set a single block state property. This method belongs to `FiltererBlockUpdate`.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Property value, or `null` to ensure property is absent

examples: // Monitor any redstone-related block changes in a loaded area (example provided in setArea above also uses this)

methods.name: and
methods.description: Combines this filter with another filter using AND logic. This method belongs to `ComposedEventFilterer`.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter to combine with AND logic

methods.name: or
methods.description: Combines this filter with another filter using OR logic. This method belongs to `ComposedEventFilterer`.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter to combine with OR logic

methods.name: setQuotient
methods.description: Change the divisor for the modulus filter. This method belongs to `FiltererModulus`.

parameters.name: quotient
parameters.description: New divisor value (will be converted to positive)
